name: Inured to Draconic Majesty
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 19
description: You have spent enough time around dragons to believe that much of their fearsomeness is bluster.
benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against extraordinary or supernatural fear effects (such as a dragonâ€™s frightful presence). If a failed saving throw against an extraordinary or supernatural fear effect would make you frightened, you are instead shaken; and if a failed saving throw would make you panicked, you are instead frightened.
